page.title: 08Organisations-Winmarleigh(2)
page.content: {-Governors of Winmarleigh School-} The Governing Body,5 in number plus the Vicar,is awaiting new articles which will expand its numbers to 13. Its basic function is to maintain the fabric of the school and to overview the admission of pupils and the kind of education which they receive. In practice the day to day running and decision making is left in the hands of the Headmaster who reports to them at termly meetings. {-The Friends of Winmarleigh School-} This parent/teacher organisation is a very informal body which meets from time to time on a 'needs' basis. It has as its main aims the support of the school financially,especially for the purchase of extras,and the fostering of beneficial links between home and school.
